meanings.definition: Of or relating to the nostrils
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined her narine area to check for any issues.
meanings.sent2: She had a narine infection that required medication.
meanings.sent3: The narine spray made her sneeze uncontrollably, much to her surprise.
meanings.sent4: The narine sensitivity was like having a built-in air quality detector.
meanings.sent5: The narine shape of his nose made him stand out in a crowd.

meanings.sent1: She could feel the cold air entering her narine as she took a deep breath.
meanings.sent2: His allergies acted up, causing his narine to become congested.
meanings.sent3: The tickling sensation in her narine made her giggle uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of fresh flowers wafted into her narine, filling her with joy.
meanings.sent5: The tiny insect flew into his narine, causing him to sneeze loudly.
